overview: Kneel in Front of Me and take your punishment. That's exactly what happens to these submissive boys. Naked and chained, they have to endure every torment and mistreatment that is bestowed upon their prone bodes. From prolonged hot wax that sees them caked in hardened candle wax to being forcibly bent over with legs apart, thanks to an ankle spreader, and ropes tying their hands to the pole, their ass is exposed and susceptible to a hard fucking whether he likes it or not. Misery and perversion abound in over two hours of maltreatment and debasement.
title: Kneel in Front of Me
